meanings.sent1: The unclimbed mountain stood tall and untouched by any human.
meanings.sent2: The unclimbed peak in the distance looked challenging to reach.
meanings.sent3: The unclimbed cliff seemed to mock the experienced climbers.
meanings.sent4: Her unclimbed dreams were waiting for her to conquer them.
meanings.sent5: The unclimbed path ahead was full of mystery and adventure.

meanings.sent1: The unclimbed wall was a reminder of his fear of heights.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of accomplishment after conquering the unclimbed route.
meanings.sent3: The unclimbed tree in the backyard was the only one left untouched by the kids.
meanings.sent4: His unclimbed record of successful ascents motivated him to keep pushing himself.
meanings.sent5: The unclimbed hill presented a new challenge for the hikers.
